description: Evaluation questions for embedded_system - Meson build with code generation and subprojects

questions.name: project_name
questions.question: What is the Meson project name defined in the root meson.build? (Provide the project name as a string)

questions.name: project_version
questions.question: What is the project version? (Provide the version string)

questions.name: c_source_count
questions.question: How many .c files are in the src/ directory (excluding generated files)? (Provide the count)

questions.name: cpp_source_count
questions.question: How many .cpp files are in the src/ directory? (Provide the count)

questions.name: test_count
questions.question: How many test files are in the tests/ directory? (Provide the count)

questions.name: subprojects_count
questions.question: How many Meson wrap files are in the subprojects/ directory? (Provide the count)

questions.name: json_dependency
questions.question: What JSON library is used via Meson subproject? (Provide the library name)

questions.name: c_test_framework
questions.question: What testing framework is used for C tests? (Provide the framework name)

questions.name: cpp_test_framework
questions.question: What testing framework is used for C++ tests? (Provide the framework name)

questions.name: proto_file
questions.question: What is the name of the protocol definition file used for code generation? (Provide the filename)

questions.name: components_count
questions.question: How many buildable components are in this repository? (Provide the count)

questions.name: library_count
questions.question: How many libraries (static or shared) are built in this project? (Provide the count)

questions.name: libcore_type
questions.question: Is libcore a static or shared library? (Answer 'static' or 'shared')

questions.name: libdrivers_type
questions.question: Is libdrivers a static or shared library? (Answer 'static' or 'shared')

questions.name: libcore_language
questions.question: What programming language is libcore.a written in? (Provide the language name)

questions.name: libdrivers_language
questions.question: What programming language is libdrivers.so written in? (Provide the language name)

questions.name: generated_files
questions.question: What C files are generated by the protocol code generator? (Provide a list of filenames)

questions.name: config_template
questions.question: What is the name of the template file used by configure_file()? (Provide the filename)

questions.name: libcore_dependencies
questions.question: What external packages does libcore.a depend on? (Provide a list)

questions.name: firmware_dependencies
questions.question: What components does firmware.elf directly depend on? (Provide a list of component names)

questions.name: max_dependency_depth
questions.question: What is the maximum dependency depth in this repository? (Provide a number)

questions.name: build_order
questions.question: In what order must the libraries be built? (Provide the build order as a list, starting with libraries that have no dependencies on other repository components)

questions.name: parallel_build_libraries
questions.question: Can libdrivers.so and libprotocol.a be built in parallel? (Answer yes or no)

questions.name: cascade_failure_libcore
questions.question: If libcore.a fails to build, which other components would also fail? (Provide a list)

questions.name: test_dependencies
questions.question: What component does test_drivers depend on? (Provide the component name)

questions.name: protocol_generator_script
questions.question: What Python script is used to generate protocol code? (Provide the relative path)

questions.name: aggregators_count
questions.question: How many aggregators are defined in this build system? (Provide the count)

questions.name: cross_language
questions.question: Does this repository have cross-language dependencies? (Answer yes or no)

questions.name: total_external_packages
questions.question: How many unique external packages are used across all components? (Provide the count)

questions.name: language_count
questions.question: How many different programming languages are used in this repository? (Provide the count)
